bibRefCitation.author: Marston
bibRefCitation.refString: Marston, N. (1970) Revision of the New World species of Anthrax (Diptera, Bombyliidae), other than the Anthrax albofasciatus group. Smithson. Contributions to Zoology, 43, 1 - 148.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Marston, 1970
: 18-19 (original description); 141 , plate 1 -h (wing).
Type locality: Jacarezinho, Paraná , Brazil .

Paratype female with labels: ( 1 ) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “BARUERI | Est. S. Paulo [State of São Paulo ] Brasil |
20 .IV. 1957
| K. Lenko leg.”; ( 2 ) printed with handwritten inscriptions on yellow paper: “ PARATYPE |
Anthrax | oedipus | aquilus |
N. Marston 19
64
”.
Preservation: Pinned; specimen intact with undissected terminalia.
